@graph.name: Advanced Reporting Dashboard - Route Analytics for Fleet Management - Route4Me
@graph.description: Analyze complex route data with Route4Me's Advanced Reporting. Track distance between stops, arrival times, fuel usage, and cargo metrics to find new ways to improve your business operations.
@graph.keywords: route analytics, fleet management, business intelligence, transportation metrics, route performance, fleet analytics, delivery insights, operational efficiency, fuel cost analysis, arrival time tracking, logistics reporting, transportation KPIs, route optimization reporting

@graph.name: Advanced Reporting Dashboard for Route Management
@graph.description: The Advanced Reporting add-on helps you analyze complex route data including distance between stops, estimated vs actual arrival times, fuel usage and costs, and cargo metrics (weight, pieces, volume). Use this detailed information to find new ways to improve your business, such as optimizing stop distances for better efficiency.

@graph.name: Request Demo
@graph.description: Contact our analytics team to see how Advanced Reporting can transform your business data into actionable insights

@graph.name: Route Metrics
@graph.value: Distance between stops, estimated vs actual arrival times, fuel consumption and costs, cargo weight, pieces, and volume tracking

@graph.name: Performance Analytics
@graph.value: Driver performance, vehicle efficiency, route optimization analysis, delivery success rates, time adherence

@graph.name: Cost Analysis
@graph.value: Fuel cost breakdown, operational expenses, cost-per-stop metrics, cost-per-mile analytics, profitability insights

@graph.name: Cargo Management
@graph.value: Weight distribution tracking, cargo volume analysis, delivery completion metrics, inventory management

@graph.name: Visualization Tools
@graph.value: Interactive dashboards, dynamic reporting, custom report generation, exportable data formats, scheduled reports
